items.sentence: Tom was a junior high school student the first time I met him.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom didn\'t know I was going to do that.
Did you really think that was what Tom was going to give Mary?
Even though I\'m the oldest one here, I\'m still pretty young.
When I was in high school, I was the best student in my class.
You\'d better get yourself out of here as quickly as possible.
A reporter asked Tom some questions as he left the courthouse.
Tom doesn\'t like being the first one to show up at any party.
Tom doesn\'t look too good today. I wonder what the matter is.
Mary doesn\'t like it when her boyfriend kisses her in public.
